duties_responsibilities.duty: Drives sales growth by flexing into multiple areas including selling, cashiering, processing, replenishing, setting floorsets, and cleaning
Serves the customer as a top priority regardless of work area
Delivers a friendly and efficient cash wrap experience, processing customer transactions accurately and efficiently at the Point of Sale
Processes merchandise to be floor ready and maintains back room and under stock to brand standards
Executes floorset proficiently and understands and adheres to brand standards
Drives store sales and growth by personally selling to customers and proactively engaging with customers
